name: Murder Scene
description:
Murder Scene is an interactive NFT. You are a rookie cop who has to investigate her first case. Will you be able to discover who is the murderer?
Discover the multiple endings and secrets that are hidden.

It is made for PC/Mac browsers. Full screen mode must be set.
Use the left/right arrow or the A/D buttons to move the character and the spacebar to interact.
You can also control the movement by clicking on the left and right side of the screen, and interact by clicking on the middle of the screen.
It can also be playabled on Android/iOS (not fully supported), click on the full screen icon and put the phone on landscape mode.
